name: Plains GP Holdings, L.P.
summary: Plains GP Holdings, L.P. (PAGP) is a publicly traded holding company that owns the general partner and incentive distribution rights of Plains All American Pipeline, L.P., a major North American provider of crude oil and natural gas liquids transportation, storage, and marketing services. Headquartered in Houston, Texas, Plains GP oversees a network of assets concentrated in key energy-producing regions, with a focus on operational efficiency and long-term value creation.
